steps.text: You wake up from a long Sleep and find yourself in a Cryo-Pod.
You remember that you are on a Colony Ship that is supposed to colonize a Planet called MATIO.

You realize that while asleep, your Body has been tamperd with and modified 
you can move faster than you remember, and a lot more precise.

You notice Instructions on the Wall: 
1) Take tools from the Locker 
2) Grab a Speed-Suit from the wardrobe 
3) Head to the Control Room and activate the Fabricator
You open the locker and find a DATA-DAGGER, you take it, grab the Speed-Suit, and head to the Control room via an elevator.
As the elevator door opens you see a Worker-Drone, it turn hostile the moment it sees you.
You grab your D-D and charge to attack.
